org.flixel.FlxPoint

type
class
subclasses
org.flixel.system.input.Mouse, org.flixel.system.input.Touch
Stores a 2D floating point coordinate.

Constructor

public new(?X : Float, ?Y : Float)
Instantiate a new point object.
Parameters:
X - The X-coordinate of the point in space.
Y - The Y-coordinate of the point in space.

Instance Variables

public x : Float

public y : Float

Instance Methods

public copyFrom(point : FlxPoint) : FlxPoint

Helper function, just copies the values from the specified point.
Parameters:
Point - Any FlxPoint.
Returns:
A reference to itself.

public copyFromFlash(FlashPoint : nme.geom.Point) : FlxPoint

Helper function, just copies the values from the specified Flash point.
Parameters:
Point - Any Point.
Returns:
A reference to itself.

public copyTo(point : FlxPoint) : FlxPoint

Helper function, just copies the values from this point to the specified point.
Parameters:
Point - Any FlxPoint.
Returns:
A reference to the altered point parameter.

public copyToFlash(FlashPoint : nme.geom.Point) : nme.geom.Point

Helper function, just copies the values from this point to the specified Flash point.
Parameters:
Point - Any Point.
Returns:
A reference to the altered point parameter.

public make(?X : Float, ?Y : Float) : FlxPoint

Instantiate a new point object.
Parameters:
X - The X-coordinate of the point in space.
Y - The Y-coordinate of the point in space.

public toString() : String

Convert object to readable string name. Useful for debugging, save games, etc.
